description: Students study the French language and French-Caribbean culture on the island of Martinique in an
immersion experience that includes home stays. The course emphasizes the multicultural aspects of
the region and facilitates student interaction with the local population. Field trips and other
cultural activities complement instruction, which is carried out at the Universit√© des Antilles.
Taught in French.  Prerequisite: French 231 or 232, or placement into French 232.  Open to
first-year students.  Offered only during Interim.
fullname: Language and Culture Studies in The French Caribbean (abroad)
